blogs.Name: The Stock market
blogs.Para1: Imagine the stock market like a giant marketplace where people buy and sell tiny pieces of ownership in companies. These pieces of ownership are called stocks.
blogs.Para2: Companies sell these stocks to raise money for things like growing their business or creating new products.
blogs.Text3: People buy stocks hoping that the company will do well, which would drive the price of the stock up. If that happens, they can then sell their stocks for more than they paid and make a profit.
blogs.Text4: The stock market itself is kind of like a meeting place for all this buying and selling.
blogs.Text6: Note:-The stock market can be like a seesaw, with prices going up and down all the time. So, just like any investment, there's always some risk involved
